recipeInstructions.text: Cut top off cob loaf. Use knife or hands to remove bread from the centre of the loaf leaving the crust intact. Set aside this bread for later
In a bowl mix sour cream, cream cheese, shredded cheese, soup mix packet, spring onion finely chopped and thawed frozen spinach (squeeze out all excess water until it's dry)
Fill Cobb shell with dip mixture and put lid back on. Wrap with foil completely and bake 10 mins at 180Â°
Remove foil from cobb, take off lid and cut lid into small pieces. Place cobb back in oven uncovered and bake for another 10 mins.
Add chopped up bread centre (removed in step 1) plus the chopped up bread lid to oven to crisp up. Bake for 5 mins and remove both bread pieces and cobb.
Serve on a tray with cobb loaf surrounded by toasted bread pieces to dunk and eat. When you have used all the bread pieces you can start to break up the cobb shell.
